title: *EASY MOVE* RENT NOW BUY LATER - Lease to purchase option
posting_body: *NEW LISTING FOR LEASE TO PURCHASE*
(see lease to purchase details below)
This home is located in Anna and we have more homes available!
Please be aware that these houses aren't available to move into immediately.
Please allow a minimum of 45 days for any potential move in.
MESSAGE FOR MORE PICTURES OR INFORMATION -
show contact info
1891 Sqft 4 Bed 2 Bath home built in 2019 in Camden Parc community in Anna.
Features a few upgrades such as bead board in guest bathroom and on kitchen island, sliding barn doors, and wood panel wall in the living room.
North Facing home with a 2 car garage.
LEASE TO PURCHASE BENEFITS INCLUDE:
🔑 Improved inventory- More options and homes for sale tend to be in better maintained than many rental options.
🔑 Make Ready-
Any necessary repairs will be taken care of for you!
🔑 Zero Obligation-
No penalties if you decide you don't want to buy the home later.
You are free to move at the end of your lease term!
🔑 Better Rates
when you Buy-
Lease-to-purchase options give you time to work on credit repair for better rates when you are ready to buy!
🔑 Flexible options- One-year lease options for up to 3 years and you are under no obligation to buy if you change your mind!
*Please note that housing vouchers aren't accepted in relation to this program*
